mapper.update: update product set productTitle=#{productTitle}, productPrice=#{productPrice}, productContents=#{productContents}, productDisRate=#{productDisRate}, collab=#{collab}, productType=#{productType}, finalPrice=#{finalPrice}, productMileage=#{productMileage} where productNum=#{productNum}
mapper.select: select count(productNum) from product where collab like concat('%',#{collab},'%') and productType like concat('%',#{productType},'%')
